name: Valdis Story: Abyssal City
summary: Valdis Story: Abyssal City is a 2013 action-adventure platform game developed by American indie studio Endless Fluff. It was funded by a successful Kickstarter campaign which concluded on April 27, 2012 with $49,574 raised, over six times its $8000 goal.
